society.books.almanac.name: Farmer's Almanac
society.books.almanac.landing_text: Your guide to crops and farm animals. This is a work in progress and most crops are not listed.
society.books.fish_finder.name: Fish Finder
society.books.fish_finder.landing_text: The wettest guide you'll ever find, telling you the secret locations of every fish.

advancements.husbandry.wrench.descriptio: Use a Block Wrench to rotate a block
effect.relics.stun.description: Disables everything except the escape button.
effect.relics.paralysis.description: Disables movement and the left and right mouse button special functions.
effect.relics.vanishing.description: Grants invisibility and slightly increases movement speed.
effect.relics.bleeding.description: Inflicts lethal percent damage over time.
effect.vinery.trippy.description: Applies a random visual effect to the target's view.
effect.vinery.jellie.description: Bestows potent blessings and heightened restorative properties.
effect.vinery.magnet.description: Causes nearby items to be pulled towards the affected target.
effect.vinery.teleport.description: Teleports target a few blocks ahead of where they were looking.
effect.vinery.creeper_effect.description: Causes target to explode at the end of the effect.
effect.vinery.water_walker.description: Grants the ability to walk on water.
effect.vinery.lava_walker.description: Grants the ability to walk on lava.
effect.vinery.double_jump.description: Increases jump height and grants the ability to double jump.
effect.vinery.staggering.description: Randomly shakes the camera and the target's movement.
effect.vinery.frosty_armor.description: Increases armor, increases attack damage, decreases movement speed, and applies the freezing effect.
effect.vinery.party_effect.description: Launches a firework when target hits an entity.
effect.vinery.climbing_effect.descriptio: Grants the ability to climb all blocks like a ladder.
effect.vinery.resistance_effect.descript: Increases armor toughness and knockback resistance.
effect.vinery.armor_effect.description: Increases armor toughness and armor level.
effect.vinery.improved_regeneration.desc: Grants regeneration and increases maximum health.
effect.vinery.improved_water_breathing.d: Grants water breathing and increases swimming speed.
Craft an Crystalarium to grow gems and minerals... Somehow.
Craft a Charging Rod to make Batteries from thunderstorms.
society.advancement.obtain_espresso_mach: Craft an Espresso Machine to live out your barista dreams.
society.advancement.obtain_artisan_hoppe: Craft an Artisan Machine for automatically filling and harvesting from Artisan Machines.
Craft an Auto-Grabber to collect products from Farm Animals harmlessly.
society.advancement.obtain_seed_maker.de: Craft a Seed Maker to turn any crop into seeds.
society.advancement.obtain_mayonnaise_ma: Craft a Mayonnaise Machine to make Mayonnaise for profit! Or drinking...
Craft an Artisan Cheese Press for turning Milk into Cheese.
society.advancement.obtain_loom.descript: Craft an Artisan Loom to craft more complex fabrics.
society.advancement.obtain_loom.title: Couturier
society.advancement.obtain_recycling_mac: Craft a Recycling Machine to turn trash into... Slightly usuable goods.
society.advancement.obtain_aging_cask.de: Craft an Aging Cask to age various goods, multiplying their value over long periods of time.
society.advancement.obtain_preserves_jar: Craft a Preserves Jar to turn crops into higher value Preserves.
society.advancement.obtain_tapper.descri: Craft a Tapper to collect resources from Trees.
society.advancement.obtain_tapper.title: Mon Bazou
society.advancement.obtain_prismatic_sha: Find a Prismatic Shard in the Skull Cavern or a max level skill.
society.advancement.obtain_jade.descript: Venture into the Skull Cavern and obtain Jade, the final tier of commonn crafting material.
society.advancement.obtain_jade.title: Entrana's Elegance
society.advancement.obtain_fire_quartz.d: Enter then Nether and find Fire Quartz, a common crafting material.
society.advancement.obtain_earth_crystal: Obtain an Earth Crystal, a common crafting material.
society.advancement.obtain_sparkstone.de: Obtain Sparkstone, used for automating certain aspects of your farm.
society.advancement.obtain_prismatic_coi: Obtain your first Prismatic Coin. How will you spend it?
Obtain your first Ancient Coin. Don't lose it...
society.advancement.obtain_sun.title: Seed Money
society.advancement.root.description: Start your farm, lay claim to riches.
society.advancement.root.title: Society: Sunlit Valley
